def test_my_credit_card(self):
        # 初始化浏览器资源变量（用于finally关闭）
        pw = None
        br = None
        ctx = None
        h5_page = None
        try:
            # 初始化发现页操作类（传入self即可复用所有minium对象）
            home_page = HomePage(self)

            # 进入广场页
            home_page.goto_home_page()

            # 展开侧边栏
            home_page.goto_my_page()

            # 等待加载侧边栏
            self.page.wait_for(
                lambda: self.page.element_is_exists(home_user_mood_btn_element, max_timeout=max_timeout),
                max_timeout=max_timeout)

            self.logger.info(f"加载侧边栏成功")
            self.capture(f"加载侧边栏后_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}", region=self.page)

            # 点击 柚企信 btn
            user_btn_list = self.page.get_elements(home_user_btn_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
            for user_btn in user_btn_list:
                # 查找 柚企信 btn
                if user_btn.text == home_user_credit_btn_name:
                    user_btn.click()

                    self.logger.info(f"点击柚企信成功")
                    self.capture(f"点击柚企信后_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}", region=self.page)
                    break

            # 等待WebView加载（关键：点击后等H5嵌入）
            self.page.wait_for(
                lambda: self.page.element_is_exists(selector="web-view", max_timeout=max_timeout),
                max_timeout=max_timeout)
            time.sleep(2)  # 额外等待src属性加载

            # 获取H5链接（核心修正：直接传self.page！）
            h5_link = get_h5_url(self.page, webview_selector="web-view", timeout=max_timeout)
            self.logger.info(f"获取H5链接成功: {h5_link}")

            # 打开浏览器访问H5（解耦的通用操作）
            pw, br, ctx, h5_page = open_h5_browser(h5_link, headless=False)
            self.logger.info(f"打开H5链接成功: {h5_link}")

            # 点击 搜索框 前截图
            filename = f"点击首页搜索框前_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}.png"
            path = os.path.join(self.screen_dir, filename)
            h5_page.screenshot(path=path, full_page=False)

            # 执行业务操作：点击首页搜索框
            h5_page.wait_for_selector(home_user_credit_search_element, timeout=max_timeout)
            h5_page.click(home_user_credit_search_element)
            self.logger.info(f"点击首页搜索框成功：{home_user_credit_search_name}")
            time.sleep(2)

            # 点击 搜索框 后截图
            filename = f"点击首页搜索框成功_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}.png"
            path = os.path.join(self.screen_dir, filename)
            h5_page.screenshot(path=path, full_page=False)
            time.sleep(2)

            # 执行业务操作：获取搜索框的企业名称
            credit_search = h5_page.wait_for_selector(home_user_credit_search_text_element, timeout=max_timeout)
            credit_search_text = credit_search.inner_text()
            self.logger.info(f"搜索历史页获取搜索框企业名称成功：{credit_search_text}")

            # 执行业务操作：点击搜索框右侧的搜索
            h5_page.wait_for_selector(home_user_credit_search_btn_element, timeout=max_timeout)
            h5_page.click(home_user_credit_search_btn_element)
            self.logger.info(f"点击搜索历史页右侧搜索 btn 成功：{home_user_credit_search_btn_name}")

            time.sleep(2)

            # 执行业务操作：查找搜索结果中是否包含搜索框中的企业
            h5_page.wait_for_selector(home_user_credit_search_result_element, timeout=max_timeout)
            credit_search_result = h5_page.locator(home_user_credit_search_result_element).first

            credit_search_result_text = credit_search_result.inner_text()

            if credit_search_result_text == credit_search_text:
                credit_search_result.click()
                self.logger.info(f"点击查询结果中的企业{credit_search_result_text}成功")
            else:
                self.logger.info(f"搜索结果（只看第1条）：{credit_search_result_text}不等于搜索值{credit_search_text}")

            # 点击 搜索 后 进入企业详情页截图
            filename = f"点击搜索后进入企业详情页成功_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}.png"
            path = os.path.join(self.screen_dir, filename)
            h5_page.screenshot(path=path, full_page=False)

            time.sleep(2)

        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"用例执行失败：{str(e)}", exc_info=True)
            raise
        finally:
            # 9. 确保浏览器关闭（无论是否报错）
            close_h5_browser(pw, br, ctx, h5_page)
            self.logger.info(f"关闭浏览器")
